availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Established June 20, 1864 to receive, revise, report on, and record the proceedings of courts-martial, military commissions, and courts of inquiry of the armies of the United States. Judge Advocate General (U.S.A.) made head of Bureau. Combined with the Corps of Judge Advocates of the Army to form the Judge Advocate General's Department on July 5, 1884.

ab.bibl: War Department. Bureau of Military Justice. 1864-1884, Organization Authority Record, NARA, (accessed May 2, 2019).
